## Bug Fix PR Template

### Description

Fixes issue: <!-- Add issue number if applicable -->

### Bug Description
- What was the issue?
- Steps to reproduce the issue.
- Impact of the issue.

### Fix Summary
- Describe how the bug is fixed.
- How has it been tested?

### Checklist
- [ ] Bug is fixed.
- [ ] Code has been tested locally.
- [ ] Relevant documentation has been updated.
